alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 15 at 11:58AM CDT until June 15 at 12:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL LINCOLN COUNTY... At 1157 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Caseyville, or 11 miles west of Brookhaven, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Vaughn and Loyd Star around 1205 PM CDT. Brookhaven around 1215 PM CDT. Enterprise around 1230 PM CDT. East Lincoln around 1240 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
